column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The greeter asks for a name and a phone number. We were told that it would be about 50 minutes and there is about 5 minutes of grace period where you have to answer to the text message to confirm the table. We took a quick walk to the river walk and walked back. Â We were a little worried because we had text the confirmation text about 7 minutes later after receiving
column2: but the greeter still let us in.
